title: High Plat player looking for a gold duo (or more) (on smurf)
body:
Bored of league looking to just chill in gold, wanna team with some chill ppl in ranked, Gold tier preferred so I don't have to try at all and still do well.

Can play anywhere happy to support. Not really looking for someone to help me rise, as I can rise through gold with Karma jungle if i like just want a relaxing league experience while still having that slightly competitive nature.

Willi God is my main
